Detailed Description

This file contains the Master application which demonstrates McSPI master mode of operation with default configuration settings.

Function Documentation

static void Edma3ComplHandlerIsr ( void *  dummy)
static

If the user has not given any callback function while requesting the TCC, its TCC specific bit in the IPR register will NOT be cleared.

If the user has not given any callback function while requesting the TCC, its TCC specific bit in the IPR register will NOT be cleared.
